Detailed Description

Data Interface to the User. Wishbone and stand-alone.

Used in the NanoFIP design.
The data_if implements the data interface to the user. The main function is interfacing the consumed_ram and produced_ram to the Wishbone interface that is presented to the user. Also in stand-alone this unit provides the data interface to the user.
